<p align="center" style="font-size:22px; margin-bottom:3rem;">

**Wise Health Home Medicines Review**, founded and led by accredited pharmacist **Sean Zhang**, provides personalised Home Medicines Reviews to support both patients and their GPs. Based in Brisbane, we focus on identifying medication-related risks, improving understanding of treatment plans, and promoting safe and effective therapy in the home. Sean brings over ten years of frontline experience in medication services and is fluent in Mandarin, enabling clear, culturally responsive care for patients who prefer consultations in that language.
